import React from 'react' import {useFormik} from 'formik' import axios from 'axios' import * as YUP from 'yup' let addfrmSchema=YUP.object({ name:YUP.string().required("insert your name"), fee:YUP.string().required("enter fee"), gender:YUP.string().required("select gender"), address:YUP.string().required("insert address"), }) const AllStudent = () => { let addFrm=useFormik({ validationSchema:addfrmSchema, initialValues:{ name:"", fee:"", gender:"", address:"" }, onSubmit:(formdata)=>{ console.log(formdata); } }) return ( <>

Add New Student

) } export default AllStudent
